  • Classes in com.foreach.across.core.events used by com.foreach.across.core 
    Class and Description
    AcrossEvent
    Marker interface used for all events to be published through the AcrossContext.
  • Classes in com.foreach.across.core.events used by com.foreach.across.core.config 
    Class and Description
    AcrossEventPublisher
    EventBus implementation for the AcrossContext.
    EventHandlerBeanPostProcessor
    Responsible for scanning every bean for Event methods.
    SpringContextRefreshedEventListener
    Takes care of actions that need to happen whenever the parent Spring ApplicationContext of the AcrossContext is refreshed.
